intro: Myoporum patens, commonly known as the spreading myoporum, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Scrophulariaceae and is characterized by its woody stems and opposite, ovate leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ability to thrive in well-drained soils. Myoporum patens is also valued for its use in landscaping and as a hedge plant.
